si.title: කන්දගඩු පුනරුත්ථාපන ස්ථානයේ ආතතිය
body_lines: பொலன்னறுவை கந்தகாடு புனர்வாழ்வு நிலையத்தில் இன்று மாலை இரு குழுக்களுக்கிடையில் இடம்பெற்ற மோதலில் பத்து கைதிகளும் ஒரு இராணுவ சிப்பாயும் காயமடைந்துள்ளனர்.
පොලිසිය පැවසුවේ ගැටුමට හේතුව නොදන්නා අතර කන්දගඩු පුනරුත්ථාපන මධ්යස්ථානයේ මුළුතැන්ගෙය සහ බොහෝ ස්ථානවල සිරකරුවන්ට අලාභහානි වී ඇති බවයි.

en.title: Tension at Kandagadu rehabilitation station
body_lines: Ten prisoners and an army soldier were injured in a clash between two groups this evening at the Kandagadu rehabilitation center in Polonnaruwa.
Police said the cause of the conflict was unknown and the kitchen at the Kandagadu rehabilitation station and the prisoners had been damaged in many places.

summary_lines: A clash at Kandagadu rehab center in Polonnaruwa injured 11, including 10 prisoners and an army soldier, due to an unknown cause. The kitchen and other areas were damaged.
